Pages.Text: Would you mind not killing my workers?
The only thing I'm killing is injustice.

Do you enjoy killing? 
Is this what you do for fun? 
Does this get your soda popping?

Should I just let you go? 
What do you think, just let you walk away?

Yeah? I should just let you walk out of here? 
What a story to tell your friends! 
Don't you think that would be nice?

But I have to stop you. 
No, I do.

I'm not sure I could live with myself if I missed this chance to prove 
that I'm the real hero around here.

I mean, it is a shame that I'm going to end this little adventure of 
yours, but I'm sure you understand. 
Even if you don't necessarily agree with me.
I think this conversation has run its course...
